title: Not being able to post on forums even though my account is level 30

replies.body: Is everything okay now?  Sometimes you just need to give the boards a moment to sync your account!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ry6RvkJr,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-06T15:55:19.292+0000)
>
> Is everything okay now?  Sometimes you just need to give the boards a moment to sync your account!

Sorry, but at the current moment it isn't. It still says "Get level 5 to post in forums". I have tried leveling to past that, and nothing has worked so far. Any ideas?
After posting, your information was synced with the forum, and your level was updated. You should be able to post now.
